Job Posting:171705 - Position: F25 GIS Co-Op Student 171705 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 08/14/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 07/31/2025 04:27 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Encepta Corporation 5345 Goring Street Burnaby V5B 3A2 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Job Title: GIS Co-Op Student Why this Role 2025 - Fall F25 GIS Co-Op Student 171705 Co-op Position Burnaby, BC Canada 8 or 12 months CAD 18.0 per hour for 0 Major List $18 - 24 DOE Are you a GIS student passionate about spatial technology and telecommunications? At Encepta, we're looking for a talented GIS Co-Op Student to join our team that brings connectivity to communities through fiber optic and wireless networks. This entry-level role offers hands-on experience in both telecommunications and GIS fields, with opportunities to learn from our in-house Design/Engineering mentors while applying your technical skills to real-world projects. This is an 8-12 month full-time contract position, ideally starting in September 2025. What You'll Be Responsible For Reporting to our Manager, Ops Excellence and collaborating with various departments, your responsibilities will include: • Operating GIS & CAD technology to create field packages and analyze data • Maintaining data integrity in our Enterprise GIS by processing and manipulating data according to standards • Creating and maintaining documentation for workflow procedures • Liaising with other departments to build integrated data workflows • Supporting the development of new workflows and automating existing data tasks • Participating in research and development projects including testing activities Upholding and promoting adherence to safety procedur • What Success Looks Like Within your co-op term, you'll be: • Creating accurate GIS datasets and field packages • Developing and implementing automated workflows • Contributing to process improvements across departments • Gaining valuable experience in telecommunications infrastructure Building technical skills in GIS, CAD, and programming • What's In It for YOU? We know that when you grow, we grow. That's why we offer more than just a co-op position: • Real-world experience: Work on actual telecommunications infrastructure projects • Skills development: Learn about both GIS technology and telecommunications engineering • Mentorship: Learn from experienced professionals in Design/Engineering • Varied experience: From data management to workflow automation to field package creation Career foundation: Build skills that are highly valued in both GIS and telecommunications industries • About Encepta Encepta is a fast-growing Canadian company offering infrastructure planning, design, and data collection services for telecommunications, utilities, and municipalities. We use innovative tools and processes to help clients build better networks. Our team is committed to quality, safety, and making a positive impact on the communities we serve. Job Requirements What We're Looking For • Education: Currently pursuing an Advanced Diploma in GIS or related field • Technical Skills: Demonstrated experience with Esri Products, spatial application design, spatial analysis, and workflow automation using Python or Model Builder • Programming Knowledge: Strong background in programming and database development, with a focus on Python, SQL, JavaScript, and web mapping services • Collaborative Mindset: Ability to work effectively in fast-paced, innovative environments • Problem-Solving Excellence: Strong analytical skills with the ability to research new approaches • Time Management: Organized, time-conscious and focused on results Software Proficiency: Experience with Google Suite or equivalent Microsoft apps • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://encepta.bamboohr.com/careers/88 How To Apply If this role sounds like the right next step for you, just hit the apply button NOW or reach out to connect. Let's build the future of connectivity together! Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
